remarks: A nonzero polynomial has some coefficient which witnesses its degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
statement:

mdegldg $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ F =/= Y ) -> E. x e. A ( ( F ` x ) =/= .0. /\ ( H ` x ) = ( D ` F ) ) ) $.
